name: Emerland Solitaire: Endless Journey
description: Welcome to Emerland Solitaire, the land of card magic! An incredible journey awaits you, in a beautiful world filled with dwarfs, elves, mermaids and many other amazing creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1000 Mhz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 128 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Constant popups to buy right at the beginning. Quite boring.
